item.title: About Me
item.description: TL;DR I’m a marine biologist and science communicator by training, but I’m taking all of the data analysis, statistics, and mathematical modeling skills I’ve learned (and continue to learn) and I’m now applying them to new problems. I’m a full-time “Journalist-Engineer” at Polygraph and The Pudding. The Long Version Hey there, I’m Amber. Professionally-speaking, I took a bit of a winding road to get to where I am now. By training, I’m a marine biologist.
